title: T206 Crawford with bat Old Mill + autograph
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: T206 Crawford with bat Old Mill + autograph
posts.post_content:
I just picked up the T206 from a fellow board member.  Selling it for exactly what I paid - $235.  

The photo was also purchased from a fellow board member about a year or so ago.  Asking $200.

Will sell both as a package for $415.

Prices are firm, please don't ask otherwise.  Selling to purchase a red Cobb, so I would also consider a cash + cards deal for your red Cobb in the VG/EX range.

Crawford T206 sold.  

Autographed photo still available.  

Photo measures 3.5" X 5"
